text: Majid Askari (; born 8 November 1991) is an Iranian weightlifter. He won a silver and a bronze medal at the 2011 and 2015 Asian championships, respectively. ==Personal records== {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !Discipline || Result (kg) || Location || Competition || Record || Date |- !
